EmailTemplate.description: Supply Chain - Go Live Changed Notification
EmailTemplate.name: CT SC Go Live Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} Go-Live Date Alert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Supply Chain Team:
A Go-Live date has been set or changed for Account #{!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c}, {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c}. Please review the account information.
Link to Customer: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c}
Thank you for your support.
BSD SALES OPERATIONS TEAM
